name: Wireless Ronin Technologies
overview:
Wireless Ronin Technologies is the developer of RoninCastÂ®, a complete software solution designed to address the evolving digital signage marketplace. Wireless Ronin provides clients with a complete, turnkey digital signage system which allows the ability to manage a digital signage network from one central location. The RoninCastÂ® digital signage software suite allows for customized distribution with network management, playlist creation and scheduling, and database integration. Wireless Ronin offers an array of services to support RoninCastÂ® software including consulting, creative development, project management, installation, and training.

Since the inception of the RoninCast product, Wireless Ronin Technologies has gained strength and momentum by exhibiting at various industry tradeshows in order to reach top corporate decision makers. In 2008, Wireless Ronin received digital signage awards in â€œEnvironmental Design Integrationâ€ for its work with Kentucky Fried Chicken (KFC), â€œInteractivity Innovationâ€ for work with Ford Motor Company, and in the â€œHospitalityâ€ category for work with Carnival Corporation. Our marketing focus at tradeshows and exhibitions has lead to the installation of the RoninCast system in more than 40 countries and on over 6,600 displays â€”with prominent clients such as Thomson Reuters, Chrysler, and Las Vegas Convention Center.
